[console_scripts]
simpl = simplhdl.__main__:main

[simplhdl.plugins]
chisel_generator = simplhdl_chisel.chisel:ChiselGenerator
encrypt = simplhdl_encrypt.encrypt.encryptflow:EncryptFlow
fusersoc_parser = simplhdl_fusesocparser.fusesocparser:FuseSocParser
lint = simplhdl_lint.lint.lintflow:LintFlow
modelsim = simplhdl_modelsim.modelsim.modelsimflow:ModelSimFlow
peakrdl_generator = simplhdl_peakrdl.systemrdl:PeakRdlGenerator
quartus = simplhdl_quartus.quartusflow:QuartusFlow
quartus-dse = simplhdl_quartus.quartusdse.quartusdseflow:QuartusDseFlow
quartus-export = simplhdl_quartus.quartusexport.quartusexportflow:QuartusExportFlow
quartus_generator = simplhdl_quartus.spd:QuartusGenerator
questasim = simplhdl_questasim.questasim.questasimflow:QuestaSimFlow
rivierapro = simplhdl_rivierapro.rivierapro.rivieraproflow:RivieraProFlow
simplhdl_parser = simplhdl_parser.simplhdlparser:SimplHdlParser
vcs = simplhdl_vcs.vcs.vcsflow:VcsFlow
vivado = simplhdl_vivado.vivadoflow:VivadoFlow
vivado_generator = simplhdl_vivado.ipxact:VivadoGenerator
xsim = simplhdl_vivado.xsim.xsimflow:XsimFlow
